message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I'm only willing to pay $13,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value to me and your own valuation.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $13,700. This product has a lot of value and I'm confident it will benefit you greatly.
